item.title: Shorts video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey,

Thanks for reaching out! We're looking for one candidate to create 60 Shorts, mostly from our long form Premiere Pro projects, each short paying $10 for a total of $600.

We do require a trial to narrow down our candidates, so please create your best Short sample by downloading one of our long form videos and creating a Short. If you're selected, you will have access to the actual project files to scale clips properly.

Let me know if you have any questions, thank you!

Channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@RealWealthVault/videos

if you are accepted that short will be paid

item.title: Video Editor for Hype Reel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create an engaging hype reel by editing several of our videos into one seamless video. The final video should capture the essence of our brand and generate excitement among our target audience. The ideal candidate should have a strong sense of storytelling and a keen eye for detail.

   Responsibilities:
   - Review and select the best footage from multiple videos
   - Edit the selected footage to create a cohesive and visually appealing hype reel
   - Enhance the video with suitable transitions, effects, and audio
   - Ensure the final video aligns with our brand guidelines and marketing objectives

   Skills required:
   - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong understanding of video composition, pacing, and storytelling
   - Ability to work with different video formats and resolutions
   - Attention to detail and excellent time management skills

   This is a medium-sized project expected to be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level video editor who can deliver high-quality results. If you are passionate about creating captivating videos that leave a lasting impression, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $120
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: AUS
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for S-Log Colour Grading - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a skilled video editor who can work with S-Log footage and batch colour grade. The editor will be responsible for enhancing the visual quality of our videos by adjusting the exposure, contrast, saturation, and white balance. to normal, true to form colours.

Just wanted normal footage to easily use for social media but videographer supplied them as s-log. We're not needing anything really cinematic, just normal beautiful colours.

There is about 3 hours worth of short 10-30 sec clips in here. We want this batch coloured and exported as individual clips. If you're able to do a sample with 1 clip, that would be appreciated.

Please advise your quote/hourly rate and if you're available to start asap. Thank you!

Budget: $40

The ideal candidate will have a passion for fashion and a keen eye for detail. You should have a strong understanding of current fashion trends and be able to translate them into compelling visuals.

item.title: Talented video editor needed for wedding highlight videos (3-4 min clip only) - Upwork
item.description:
Talented video editor needed for wedding highlight videos, with a target length of 3-4 minutes (no long edit required).

Task:
- you will need to edit wedding highlight videos with a target length of 3-4 minutes based of an already selected and arrange timeline
- type of edit: non chronological, cinematic/modern/pop style
- adding some sound design elements to create a more professional video
- ability to choose the right songs (we usually use 2-3 songs (parts of it) to set different moods / or live audio from the event) and proportions for the particular project (we will provide additional details and info to support you with this)
- you will receive a timeline (either as a Premiere or Davinci project file) with selected / best shots from the different parts of the day which will be either trimmed down to the good part (preparations, shooting) or suggested interesting parts highlighted with markers (mostly party shots) so you will not have to search around the entire footage for what is the best, but will be able to identify the most useful parts quickly and start with the creative/storytelling part basically. We will also give you additional details regarding the wedding day and the project.


Requirements:
- attention to detail and ability to create an appealing end result
- existing portfolio is a must and should highlight your experience in this field
- Premiere Pro (or Davinci Resolve) user.
- Ability to handle 4K footage (we might also provide proxy files if needed)
- Reasonably fast internet speed
- Our work is with Christian / European couples, so we ideally look for someone with understanding and experience with these kinds of weddings.


Cooperation:

- you will have to match to a degree your edit with our style (examples: https://vimeo.com/storyfilms/brigi-johnny-best-moments or https://vimeo.com/storyfilms/henrietta-arnold-best-moments )
- any voice / speech that is relevant and could be used in the video (short message of the priest / maybe other short announcements useful for making transitions) will be prepared and selected. These will be mostly in Hungarian or Romanian (but since we do the selection, you are not required to understand these languages)
If cooperation is good based on the first experience we would send you more work ( up to 12-15 wedding projects in the following 3-4 months)
You are not required to do any colour grading/correction, just work on the flat image (we are interested in the quality of the edit)

If you can work fast, that is awesome, the sooner we get the video the better. However delivery times of 2-3 weeks are also ok if you can deliver a good edit. So we would prefer someone who can do an edit within the frame of a month at most.

Please include in your proposal:
- relevant examples
- explain why you would be good in matching up with our style
- estimated budget for 1 clip
- any questions that you might have regarding the work.
- estimated delivery from the point you received the project

Thank you!


Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Short Video
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Short Video
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Motion Designer to create stylish corporate video - Upwork
item.description:
I am a graphic designer looking for a motion designer to help with a corporate video for a transportation company.  Please read below closely for information:

I will prepare and create as much graphics as possible for the video, so the motion designer wont have to do too much design work. There will probably be SOME graphic work, but mostly motion, voice over, transition, etc.

As the designer, I will art direct the video and work closely with you and a few rounds of revision to get it done.

Here is the video inspiration for the project. It DOES NOT have to be as complex, but we are looking for this style of video.  https://vimeo.com/270909024

So in summary I will need:
• Motion designer to help me with an old-school insired style of video above (less complex animations that the example)
• You will have support from me for the imagery, script and the voice over.
• I will require revisions to make the video perfect.

Looking forward to working with you!

Thank you!

Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:28 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Transcription for TikTok, YouTube and Instagram Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled freelancer to help us download and transcribe approximately 5,000 social media videos from YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram.  This project requires a quick turnaround time of 24-48 hours.

IMPORTANT: See how to apply at the bottom of this job.

Scope of work:
-Download approximately 5,000 videos from provided URLs.
-Transcribe the content of each video.
-Include timestamps in the transcriptions.
-Deliver the transcriptions in CSV format.
-Use open-source tools for downloading and transcription, if possible.
-Consider any API costs for transcription in the proposal.

Requirements:
-Experience with video downloading and transcription.
-Ability to deliver high-quality work within a 24-48 hour timeframe.
-Familiarity with open-source tools and technologies.
-Provide details on the technology, process, and scripts used for downloading and transcription.

How to Apply:
Please fill in this Google Form which shoudl take 2 minutes. https://forms.gle/xdTQ6QfqtW43Xxcs6

Anyone who does not fill in the form will not be considered.

Good luck!


Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:27 UTC
Category: AI Data Annotation & Labeling
Skills:Data Annotation, Data Labeling, Video Annotation, Whisper API, Transcription Software, Video Transcription, Audio Transcription
Skills: Data Annotation, Data Labeling, Video Annotation, Whisper API, Transcription Software, Video Transcription, Audio Transcription
Country: Canada
click to apply

IMPORTANT: See how to apply at the bottom of this job.

Scope of work:
-Download approximately 5,000 videos from provided URLs.
-Transcribe the content of each video.
-Include timestamps in the transcriptions.
-Deliver the transcriptions in CSV format.
-Use open-source tools for downloading and transcription, if possible.
-Consider any API costs for transcription in the proposal.

Requirements:
-Experience with video downloading and transcription.
-Ability to deliver high-quality work within a 24-48 hour timeframe.
-Familiarity with open-source tools and technologies.
-Provide details on the technology, process, and scripts used for downloading and transcription.

How to Apply:
Please fill in this Google Form which shoudl take 2 minutes. https://forms.gle/xdTQ6QfqtW43Xxcs6

Anyone who does not fill in the form will not be considered.

Good luck!


Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00

item.title: Professional Spokesperson for Website Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a professional spokesperson who can help us highlight our business services on our website. The spokesperson will be responsible for creating a video that is under 2 minutes long. The video should effectively showcase our services and engage our target audience. The spokesperson should have excellent communication skills and be able to deliver the message with confidence and credibility. Attention to detail and a clear, articulate speaking style are essential. The spokesperson should be comfortable in front of the camera and be able to follow a script or ad-lib when necessary.

Skills needed:
- Excellent communication skills
- Confident and articulate speaking style
- Ability to engage the audience
- Comfortable in front of the camera
- Script reading and ad-lib capabilities

item.title: Replicate Video Ad from TikTok for Multi-platform Use - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled freelancer who can replicate a video ad from TikTok for use on other platforms. The video ad is already created and available on TikTok, and we want to adapt it for use on different social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube. The freelancer will be responsible for recreating the video ad with the same concept, design, and messaging while ensuring it meets the requirements and specifications of each platform.

Example Video link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ar6aOZmTW0fYICwx3LkuVI3CQotfNfNx/view

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about video editing? We're looking for a talented video editor to join our team for Instagram Reels and YouTube videos. As a mental health coach, I have raw footage that needs your creative touch to transform into eye-catching reels and educational meditation videos.

Your role? Edit the videos I provide or create your own based on the content I give. Enhance them with cool photos and videos to match my messages and make them visually stunning! We will pay you for each video, aiming for around 3 videos (2 reels 1 youtube video) every week. Max 3 hours a week! 12 hours monthly to start with.

Join us in spreading awareness about mental health in a fun and engaging way. If you have the skills and passion, let's team up and create something meaningful!

Hourly Range: $6.00-$8.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video, Education, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video, Education, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply
